title: Clamp a temperature reading to [0, 100]
story: A temperature sensor may temporarily report values outside the safe operating range. Clamp the reading so downstream logic never sees out-of-range temperatures.
post: clamped_temp >= 0 and clamped_temp <= 100 and ((sensor_temp < 0 and clamped_temp == 0) or (sensor_temp > 100 and clamped_temp == 100) or (sensor_temp >= 0 and sensor_temp <= 100 and clamped_temp == sensor_temp))
